Case 1:19-cr-00490-RMB Document 32 Filed 07/18/19 Page 33 of 33

Conclusion & Order

Based upon the foregoing, the Government's motion for remand (detention) is granted and the Defense motion for pretrial release is denied.

Dated: New York, New York July 18, 2019

RICHARD M. BERMAN, U.S.D.J.

33
DOJ-OGR-00000504

text_blocks.content: Based upon the foregoing, the Government's motion for remand (detention) is granted and the Defense motion for pretrial release is denied.
Dated: New York, New York July 18, 2019

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court order with a signature from Judge Richard M. Berman. The document is in good condition with no visible redactions or damage.
